definitions.definition: The Ancient Greek god of the west wind , supposed to be the gentlest of the winds and the messenger of spring . His parents are Eos / Aurora and Astraeus , and his brothers are Boreas , Notus and Eurus , (the Anemoi ), and the Astra Planeta . His wife is Chloris and their son is Karpos . His Roman counterpart is Favonius .

main_definition: ( Greek mythology ) The Ancient Greek god of the west wind , supposed to be the gentlest of the winds and the messenger of spring . His parents are Eos / Aurora and Astraeus , and his brothers are Boreas , Notus and Eurus , (the Anemoi ), and the Astra Planeta . His wife is Chloris and their son is Karpos . His Roman counterpart is Favonius .
